price: (32) They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals[1541]
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: [1541]- i.e., those who defied Lot (upon him be peace).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
